name: Typhoon
description: A great torrent quickly floods the field, in just a matter of seconds everything is underwater and you struggle to stay afloat trough the crashing waves around.
effect:
- All Water-Type moves have +1 minimum damage and deal 1 flat damage at the end of damage calculation.
- All Water moves gain the Never Fail and High Critical trait.
- All Fire-Type Moves fail to be executed.
- No one can be affected by the Burn Status Condition.
- Moves that add positive effects in Sunny Weather fail to be executed.
- Other Weather conditions fail to activate through any means.
